texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Between Friday 30 March and Monday 2 April, the majority of the transport network is open. If you're travelling in London, make the most of your bank holiday weekend by checking the planned works and events that may affect your journey. You can find travel advice for the Easter weekend here."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Page last updated: 2 April 2018, 18:45
Essential works on the Northern line may take longer than expected. It is possible that very early Northern line services may be disrupted on Tuesday 3 April.
Check Status updates before you travel on Tuesday morning or follow us on Twitter @northernline for the latest travel information.
If you're travelling in London over the Easter Bank Holiday, closures include:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eTfL Rail:\u003c/strong\u003e No service on the entire line from Friday until Monday","\u003cstrong\u003eLondon Overground:\u003c/strong\u003e No service betweenul","\u003cstrong\u003eNorthern line:\u003c/strong\u003e No service between Charing Cross/Moorgate and Golders Green/East Finchley from Friday until Monday","\u003cstrong\u003eCircle and Hammersmith \u0026 City lines:\u003c/strong\u003e No service between Edgware Road and Hammersmith on Saturday and Sunday","\u003cstrong\u003eDistrict line:\u003c/strong\u003e No service between Edgware Road and High Street Kensington on Saturday and Sunday","\u003cstrong\u003eLondon Trams:\u003c/strong\u003e No service between Sandilands and Reeves Corner from Friday until Wednesday 4 April (closure changes to Sandilands to East Croydon from Thursday 5 April until Sunday 8 April).","\u003cstrong\u003eNational Rail:\u003c/strong\u003e Planned works will affect services, including to and from Heathrow, Euston, Liverpool Street, London Bridge, Moorgate, Paddington and Waterloo"]}
Other travel changes include:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eDriving: \u003c/strong\u003e No Congestion Charge or T-Charge from Friday to Monday","\u003cstrong\u003eBuses:\u003c/strong\u003e Amended timetable for Friday and Monday","\u003cstrong\u003eDLR: \u003c/strong\u003e A Saturday service will run on Friday, Saturday and Monday"]}
Thursday 29 March is also expected to be busy in and around London.
{"template":"bulletlist"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Easter closures map"}

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"TfL Rail, London Overground, Tube and tram closures","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/easter-closure-map-2018.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 238KB","image":{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/easter-closure-map-2018-sm2.jpg","alt":"Easter travel map"}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"TfL Rail"}

There's no service on the entire line from Friday 30 March until Monday 2 April while Network Rail carries out track and station improvements including Crossrail construction work.

Please use the Central line between Liverpool Street and Stratford. Rail replacement buses will also run between:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Stratford City and Romford calling at Forest Gate, Manor Park, Ilford, Seven Kings, Goodmayes and Chadwell Heath (approx. every 10 minutes)","Newbury Park (for the Central line) and Shenfield calling at Chadwell Heath, Romford, Gidea Park, Harold Wood and Brentwood (approx. every 15 minutes)"]}
For live information on TfL Rail, see our status updates page or follow @TfLRail on Twitter .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"London Overground"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No service between Romford and Upminster from Friday 30 March until Monday 2 April due to Crossrail construction work and Network Rail infrastructure work. Please use local bus routes:ul","No service between Liverpool Street and Enfield Town/Cheshunt/Walthamstow Central from Saturday 31 March to Monday 2 April (extends to Chingford on Sunday 1 April until approximately 10:15). This is due to Network Rail track and infrastructure work and station improvement works at White Hart Laneul","No service between New Cross Gate and Crystal Palace/West Croydon on Saturday 31 March and Sunday 1 April due to Network Rail track and infrastructure workul"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Service changes"}
Routes affected by closures:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["An amended Saturday service will run on Friday, Saturday and Monday. An amended Sunday service will run on Sunday"]}
Routes without closures:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["An amended Saturday service will run on Friday and Monday","A Saturday service will run on Saturday","A Sunday service will run on Sunday"]}
For live information on London Overground, see our status updates page or follow @LDNOverground on Twitter .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Tube"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Circle line and Hammersmith \u0026 City lines: Saturday 31 March and Sunday 1 April"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["There's no service between Edgware Road and Hammersmith on the Circle line and Hammersmith \u0026 City lines while we test new signalling. Please use alternative Tube and local bus routes."]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"District line: Saturday 31 March and Sunday 1 April"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["There's no service between Edgware Road and High Street Kensington while we test new signalling. Please use alternative Tube and local bus routes."]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Northern line: Friday 30 March - Monday 2 April"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["There's no service between Charing Cross/Moorgate and Golders Green/East Finchley while we carry out points works at Camden Town. Please use alternative Tube, bus or rail replacement bus services."]}
Rail replacement buses will run between:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Euston and Finchley Road (for the Jubilee line) calling at Mornington Crescent, Camden Town, Chalk Farm, Belsize Park, Hampstead and Golders Green (approx. every 4 minutes)","King's Cross St Pancras and Finchley Central calling at Camden Town, Kentish Town, Tufnell Park, Archway, Highgate and East Finchley (approx. every 8 minutes)"]}
Also, on Tuesday 3 and Wednesday 4 April, all southbound Northern line trains from Edgware will be via Charing Cross and all trains from High Barnet and Mill Hill East will be via Bank.
For up-to-date information on Tube services follow @TfLTravelAlerts or visit TfL's individual Tube line accounts for real-time information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"London Trams"}
There's no service between Sandilands and Reeves Corner from Friday 30 March to Wednesday 4 April while we carry out track renewal work.
Please use local bus routes or the express rail replacement buses which will run approximately every 8-10 minutes between Sandilands and Waddon Marsh calling at Vicarage Road (for Wandle Park)
From Thursday 5 until Sunday 8 April, there is no service between Sandilands and East Croydon. Please use local bus routes.
For the latest information on how trams are running, visit our status updates page or follow @TramsLondon on Twitter.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Driving"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["There will be no Congestion Charge or T-Charge from Friday 30 March untilÂ Monday 2 April.","Planned works mean there will be traffic diversions in central London. Please allow extra time."]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Camden High Street closure"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Camden High Street will be closed between the junctions of the A400, Kentish Town Road and Inverness Street, while maintenance works are carried out at Camden Town Station.\u003cbr /\u003eThis closure will take place from Thursday 29 March at 22:00 to Tuesday 3 April at 06:00. A signed diversion route will be in place. However some delays are expected so please allow more time for your journey.\u003cbr /\u003eParking suspensions will be enforced at various locations from 17:30 Thursday 29 March through to 06:00 Tuesday 3 April."]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Baker StreetÂ two-way"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Works are taking place to \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/improvements-and-projects/baker-street\"\u003econvert Baker Street and Gloucester Place to two-way traffic\u003c/a\u003e . One lane in each direction will be closed along Marylebone Road (between the junctions with Balcombe Street and Baker Street) until May 2018."]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"West End project"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Works are set to begin to convert Tottenham Court Road and Gower Street to two-way traffic. \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/index\"\u003eStatus updates here\u003c/a\u003e ."]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Wigmore Street"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Work to improve Wigmore Street for pedestrians and cyclists is underway. Six junctions will be improved with upgraded pedestrian crossings, advanced stop lines for cyclists and where possible widened footways."]}
For the latest information on traffic conditions, see our traffic status updates page or follow @TfLTrafficNews on Twitter .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Buses"}
On Friday 30 March and Monday 2 April, buses will run to a different timetable.
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Friday - Saturday service","Saturday - normal (Saturday) service","Sunday - normal (Sunday) service","Monday - Sunday service"]}
For the latest information on how buses are running, see our bus status updates or follow @TfLBusAlerts on Twitter .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"DLR"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["A Saturday service will run on Friday, Saturday and Monday","On Sunday, a normal Sunday service will run"]}
For live information on DLR, see our status updates page or follow @LondonDLR on Twitter .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Cycling"}
Santander Cycles will be available throughout the Easter Bank Holiday.
The following docking stations will be out of service for works:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Smugglers Way","Flood Street","Drummond Street","Foley Street, Fitzrovia","Bourne Street, Belgravia","Clifford Street, Mayfair","Portugal Street, Holborn","Moor Street, Soho","Westfield Eastern Access Road, Shepherd's Bush (long-term)","Rodney Street, Angel (long-term)","South Quay West, Canary Wharf (long-term)"]}

Check availability of Santander Cycles using the online docking station map , or download Santander Cycles from the App Store or Google Play . Follow @SantanderCycles on Twitter for the latest updates.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Coaches"}
Services are expected to be very busy, so advance booking is strongly recommended. Please check the timetable of your service with your service operator. Get the full list of coach operators .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Dial-a-Ride"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Regular bookings will not run on Good Friday and Easter Monday but if you still wish to travel, please make a one-off booking"]}
Full details of Easter booking arrangements are available on the Dial-a-Ride page .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Taxis \u0026 private hire vehicles"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Taxi (black cabs) and private hire services, including minicabs, will be running throughout Easter. Find out more about taxi \u003ca href=\"/modes/taxis-and-minicabs/taxi-fares\"\u003efares\u003c/a\u003e ."," \u003ca href=\"/modes/taxis-and-minicabs/book-a-taxi\"\u003eFind booking information, i\u003c/a\u003e ncluding phone numbers and email addresses,Â for minicab and other private hire operators in London"]}
For up-to-date information, visit our taxis and minicabs section or follow @TfLTPH on Twitter .
Please be aware that planned works and closures on the roads may affect your journey. Visit our live traffic status tool for more information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Rivers"}

The Woolwich Ferry will run a Sunday service on Friday and Monday, and a normal service on Saturday and Sunday.
Thames Clippers will run a weekend service on Friday and Monday, and a normal service on Saturday and Sunday.
CheckÂ our river section for more information
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Emirates Air Line"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["On Friday and Saturday, services will run between 08:00 and 23:00","On Sunday and Monday, services will run between 09:00 and 22:00"]}
Find out more in our Emirates Air Line section or follow @EmiratesAirLDN on Twitter.

links.title: August Bank Holiday & Notting Hill Carnival
Improvements between Acton and Wood Lane
